series_description: This series consists of background information gathered during research for Commission studies that are not used in the production of, or reflected in, an interim or final study report or considered by the Commission.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after file is closed then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of background information not determined to be of historical value or possible future use, gathered during research for Commission studies that is relied upon or otherwise used in the production of an interim of final study report or considered by the Commission.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after file is closed then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of background information not determined to be of historical value or possible future use, gathered during research for Commission studies that have been funded by either may or may not be relied upon or otherwise used in the production of an interim of final study report or considered by the Commission.
retention_statement: Retain and destroy in accordance with the terms of the grant. If grant becomes inactive (silent), then records can be transferred to Series 005727 or 005728.

series_description: This series consists of agendas and materials presented at commission meetings, including any minutes. May include presentation materials deemed to be of long-term value to the Commission.

series_title: Correspondence/Subject Files - Director, Commission Members and Other Officials - Historically Significant
series_description: This series documents historically significant incoming and outgoing letters, memoranda, faxes, notes and their attachments not of a routine administrative nature, not listed on an agency specific schedule, in any physical format including, but not limited to, paper and e-mail.

series_title: Sub-Committee and Task Force Meeting Records
series_description: This series consists of member lists, agendas and materials presented at sub-committee and task force meetings, and the minutes for these meetings.
